    Entrepreneurship

    Entrepreneurship is living a few years of your life like most people won’t, so that you can spend the rest of your life like most people can’t.
    Unknown

    Entrepreneurship is neither a science nor an art. It is a practice.
    Peter Drucker

    Many great ideas go unexecuted, and many great executioners are without ideas. One without the other is worthless.
    Tim Blixseth

    Business opportunities are like buses, there’s always another one coming.
    Richard Branson

    Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
    Maya Angelou

    If what you are doing is not moving you towards your goals, then it’s moving you away from your goals.
    Brian Tracy

    Don’t make friends who are comfortable to be with. Make friends who will force you to lever yourself up.
    Thomas J. Watson

    Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
    Winston Churchill

    If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.
    Napoleon Hill

    Be a man and make it happen for yourself.
    Rahul Chari

    In order to succeed, your desire for success should be greater than your fear of failure.
    Bill Cosby

    You were born to win, but to be a winner, you must plan to win, prepare to win, and expect to win.
    Zig Ziglar

    Coming together is a beginning; keeping together is progress; working together is success.
    Henry Ford

    Successful people are always looking for opportunities to help others. Unsuccessful people are asking, What’s in it for me?
    Brian Tracy

    The rich invest in time, the poor invest in money.
    Warren Buffett
